post.body: jailbreak that mother and dont look back. ziphone for the win...
maybe the new common album will help. update on 80s electro with bassy neptune hooks fo' da children -- read inner 14 yold boy.
if not rick warren, who? and wouldn't it seem "exclusionary"? does "inclusionary" include views you oppose, find damaging, and kill?
"force multiplying", "increasing utility", "juice/boost the use" , "extend", "brighten","fire up" ...
sup fiona
is awake
Is on the way...
Soggy, stuck, and waiting
There is something wrong about being beaten motocross biking by a woman that preggers... Nine months pregnant. Ego fail.
Honey's sit and eat... Oh honey, you latke temptress. How I love thee
Had a great convo w gidget, big e, and jeb about automation, socialization, technology, culture making, music, the end of the world and naan
Having dinner with the philly crew
circle thift + hot rocket w gidget, jeb and big e... just heard the one about the peanut butter and breast milk.
haz philadelphia...
fung wahing it south...
usha foods and matcha tea latte... :)
On long but always worth it line at gino's pizzeria in long beach.
What are you most thankful for this week?
at the office, working...
is feeding his inner rocker a heaping serving of rockband 2!!
"shut up and deal" -- The Apartment (1960)
crashing firefox, crouching developer
train to long beach... derailed train at jamaica slowing us down.
clinton and obama. all we need is mccain at an agency and the usa can sing kumbaya together... empire, with a heart and a smile but no wink.
BNP list leak people got caught by welsh police...aww man.
bit.ly v tinyurl the battle wages on...
rubbing 1s and 0s together at work, building a fire of code
went to see synecdoche, New York last night... still picking up the pieces of my mind... avoid if in a good or really sad mood. #movie
nyc == ice box. now, back to work...
which say you? random and unpredictable outcome that is passionate or a static and guarenteed outcome that is routine to boring.
nurturing obsession with ambient findability
indeed, FoxMarks: ftw . ! Rey Bango
the company party last night ... in the office, had an open bar, and was on a wednesday night... very little eye contact in meetings today.
Just when you think you got it all nailed down, life has a way of pulling the rug out from under us.
Sick passenger at west 4th causing massive subway congestion on queens bound trains from queens all the way to downtown manhattan. Avoid f.
"The essence of bravery is being without self-deception" -- Pema Chödrön
in the nyc post frozen economy crash, below freezing weather, empty consumerist cannibalism and victimized worker gazes kind of way...
radiohead's 'knives out' continues to be most romantic song about post frozen plane crash cannibalism ever written. appro way to start 2day
At prof stuart ewing's holiday party having and over hearing the most exciting and intelligent conversations in months. Thank you dr stu.
last week it was steven soderbergh & 300 angry new yorkers, this week the ewings' holiday party. Friday becoming intelligent discourse day
Madoff like a bandit
Aol games team went on an nocturnal outing last night. i woke up expecting a void, but nyc is still here. Maybe they're losing their touch??
slow work day? frightened about economy? alone during the holidays? too broke for vegas? lose yourself in vice, http://tinyurl.com/3j586m !
when dark cold winter in new york seeps into your psyche... seek solace in La Flor Bakery & Cafe Oatmeal Raisin Cookies. jahfurry ftw
your mom "... is over capacity!" i guess 'a whale' just wasn't big enough...
need to get my mind distracted... anyone want to go to see CSS tomorrow @ webster hall?!
Thank you cassi for reviving a good idea
